description.translate: Was, is and will be, he will be able to recover from everything.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Plastron éternel\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Fut, est et sera, il saura se\"}","{\"text\":\"§7remettre de tout.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Was, is and will be, he will be\"}","{\"text\":\"§7able to recover from everything.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7HAS§a1 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
